title: Project X521: and the ancient saviours
description: When a threat considered beyond the bounds till now emerges from the shadows of Nazi Germany that even India’s elite Special Forces fail to counter, an Intelligence Officer teams up with a Professor of Ancient sciences. Their only hope makes them dig deep into their thousands-of-year-old past.Will India be able to intercept and neutralize this threat?What was this of yore hope and what was this threat from the shadows of Nazi Germany?A story of enthralling events encompassing Pakistan’s premier Intelligence Agency and India’s coveted External Intelligence Wing.But is this all or there are greater things at play?Read this Mythological Sci-Fi Thriller to find out!!!
author: Sahil  Sharma
